hypothesis_content.title: ETF Flow Reversal Acceleration
hypothesis_content.statement: When spot Bitcoin ETFs experience 3+ consecutive days of net outflows totaling >$500M, a single day of net inflows >$100M will trigger a disproportionately large BTC price rally (minimum 3% next-day gain) as short-covering combines with renewed institutional bid.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended ETF outflows create negative sentiment feedback loop and attract short positioning. A sudden reversal signals either: 1) institutional re-allocation after tax-loss harvesting, or 2) value buyers stepping in. The combination of short covering + new institutional bids creates asymmetric upside. Current $23B options expiry adds gamma exposure that can amplify moves.
entry_conditions: 3+ consecutive days of net ETF outflows totaling >$500M
Single day net inflows >$100M (confirmed after market close)
BTC closes above 20-day SMA on inflow day
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Less than 40% of such inflow reversals after extended outflows result in >3% next-day gains.
